india_wonders.name: Taj Mahal
india_wonders.description: A white marble mausoleum built by Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife Mumtaz Mahal.

india_wonders.name: Qutub Minar
india_wonders.description: A 73-meter tall minaret, part of the Qutub Complex, marking the beginning of Muslim rule in India.

india_wonders.name: Hampi
india_wonders.description: Ruins of the ancient Vijayanagara Empire, featuring temples, palaces, and markets.

india_wonders.name: Ajanta and Ellora Caves
india_wonders.description: A collection of Buddhist, Hindu, and Jain rock-cut caves, renowned for their sculptures and paintings.

india_wonders.name: Konark Sun Temple
india_wonders.description: A 13th-century temple dedicated to the Sun God, designed in the shape of a colossal chariot.

india_wonders.name: Statue of Unity
india_wonders.description: The tallest statue in the world, standing at 182 meters, dedicated to Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel.
